description:
Trafalgar Law waits for the right moment to make his move, Blackbeard is pursued by powerful marines, and Chopper makes a surprising return to the land of gargantuan birds!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les pirates en action. Le Nouveau Monde, lieu de toutes les surprises
Pirates Get on the Move! Astounding New World!
يبدأ القراصنة تحرّكهم! العالم الجديد الّذي لا نظير له!
動き出す海賊たち! 驚天動地の新世界
